nodes.text: The 3HX3 was a repulsorlift land mine produced by Conner Ship Systems. When the repulsorlift sensors detected an incoming repulsorcraft or soldiers, the mine shot three meters into the air. The explosion could kill a whole squad of infantry or even heavily damage an AT-ST. Rebel vanguard divisions carried 3HX3 mines during the Galactic Civil War.
The 3HX3 mines appear in the Battlefront video game series.
